data.title: I Made it Myself trophy in MotorStorm: Apocalypse
data.meta_description: How to unlock the I Made it Myself trophy in MotorStorm: Apocalypse: Modify your vehicle using all the available options. This is a Bronze trophy.
data.text:
Spilner1001

19 Jan 2014 19 Jan 2014 04 Feb 2014

1 0 0

You can unlock this as soon as you start the game as you will have at least one option to change in each section

From the main menu enter into 'Wreckcreation' and 'Vehicle Customisation' and choose any vehicle. (Though I suggest ATV)

There are 4 main areas you need to make changes in, Parts, Livery, Stickers and Personalisation.

Each vehicle type has different selections in these 4 areas depending on the vehicle type so the quickest one to do will be the ATV.

Parts - Wheels, Frame, Headlights, Front Mudguards, Handlebars, Engine, Footrests, Rear Mudguards, Bodywork, Tail-Lights and Exhaust System.

Livery - Base Colour, Vinyl Design, Vinyl Colours 1, 2 and 3

Stickers - Artwork and Stickers 1 - 5

Personalisation - Race Number, Weathering, Grunge and Scratches.

Make changes in all these areas and press 'Save and Exit' and the trophy will pop in the loading screen.
